meanings.definition: An estimate that is too high.
meanings.sent1: Her overestimations of how long it would take to finish the project caused delays.
meanings.sent2: The team's overestimations of their abilities led to disappointment.
meanings.sent3: His overestimations of his own strength always make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The overestimations of the company's worth eventually led to its downfall.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's constant overestimations of our knowledge made us feel inadequate.

meanings.definition: The act of estimating too highly.
meanings.sent1: The overestimations of the cost of the event made them reconsider their plans.
meanings.sent2: His constant overestimations of his own importance annoyed his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The overestimations of the weather forecast made everyone bring umbrellas on a sunny day.
meanings.sent4: The overestimations of the team's performance were quickly proven wrong.
meanings.sent5: Her overestimations of how much food to cook always left leftovers for days.
